scripts.test: svelte-kit sync && node ./scripts/verify-shared-import.mjs && node ./scripts/verify-scaffold.mjs && vitest run
scripts.test:coverage: svelte-kit sync && node ./scripts/verify-shared-import.mjs && node ./scripts/verify-scaffold.mjs && vitest run --coverage
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('node:fs'); fs.rmSync('.svelte-kit', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.rmSync('build', { recursive: true, force: true });"
